"Achievist" - a person who consistently works towards their goals and achieves success through dedication and hard work.
"Determinator" - a person who is determined to achieve their goals and will not give up, even in the face of obstacles.
"Perseverator" - a person who persists in their efforts towards achieving their goals, even when progress seems slow or impossible.
"Goal-oriented" - a person who has a clear focus on achieving their goals and takes consistent action towards achieving them.
"Consistent" - a person who consistently works towards their goals and maintains a steady level of effort and dedication.
